1: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
10: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
2: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
3: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
4: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
5: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
6: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
7: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
8: Get busy living or get busy dying.
9: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
